basic.description:
An exploration of creativity in music education broadly defined, e.g., classroom, applied studio, religious or community organizations. The focus is on research, theories and practices of musical creativity, including improvisation and aspects of composition.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Studies in Music Education: Creativity

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    MUSC 153/6.0 or MUSC 255/6.0 or MUSC 320/6.0 or MUSC 321/6.0 or MUSC 324/6.0 or MUSC 328/3.0 or MUSC 393/3.0 or (MUSC 273/3.0 and MUSC 274/3.0).
